lines.text:
[to G-Money]
You fucked up. You fucked up big time. You're incapable of running this shit. *Sit* your five-dollar ass down, before I make change.
Ain't no Uzi's made in Harlem. Not one of us in here owns a poppy field. This thing is bigger than Nino Brown. This is big business. This is the American way.
I wanna shoot you so bad, my dick's hard!
Money talks, and bullshit runs a marathon. So, see ya and I wouldn't want to be ya.
[last lines]
Idolater! Your soul is required in hell!
[Shoots Nino]
I never liked you anyway, Pretty Motherfucka!

[Referring to his girlfriend]
Cancel that bitch, I'll buy another one.
Drugs ain't a black thing, or a white thing. It's a death thing. Death don't give a shit about color.

[sobbing]
I tried to kick... but that shit just be callin' me man, it be callin' me, man... I just got to go to it!
You gotta rob to get rich in the Reagan era.
You cut a side deal with that motherfucker.
[G-Money opens his mouth, but Nino interrupts him]
Yes, you did. Yes, you did, Gee. Fucking Cain. My brother's keeper. Was it this...
[takes crack pipe from him]
... glass dick you've been sucking on? Was that it? Now I see how you let that motherfucker infiltrate. He used you, Gee. What ever happened to, "Am I my brother's keeper?"

[Sullenly]
You know what happened to it. "The world is mine." Remember that? "Everything is mine. Everything!" Even my woman.
Is that what this is about?
[about Uniqua]
That fucking skeezer? You think I give a fuck about her? Fuck that ho bitch! I don't give a fuck about her!
It ain't about her! It's about us. I love you, man.
[Nino turns his back on G-Money, making him angrier and angrier]

You embarrassed me, man! In front of all them people, you treated me like I was soft. You treated me like I was spineless! We built this shit! You didn't do this shit by yourself! You forgot about me, man, your brother.
What has this done to us? Keisha... dead. The Duh Duh Man... dead.
Let's just make it like it was. Let's be a family. Let's make it like it was. Fuck them cars and them bitches and all that shit. Fuck that shit! Let's do us, me and you. Let's be a family again.
[Nino, in tears, hugs G-Money]
I'm on the run. It can never go back the way it was.
[Nino kisses G-Money on the cheek]
But I'll tell you how we can make it right.
[Nino shoves G-Money away and pulls out his gun; G-Money falls to his knees]
CMB. CMB! We all we got!
[Nino grips his wrist in order to steady the gun he is holding]
Am I my brother's keeper.

[Grits his teeth]
Yes I am!
[Nino shoots G-Money dead and for a brief moment turns the gun towards his own head, but stops himself]
What? All he gets is a year? No, this ain't happening. I should have killed you myself, bitch.
Well, that's the difference between you and me. Don't get mad, Tito. It's the *law*. Sucks, huh? Well, maybe when this is over with, you can come and work for me.
Man a drug dealer is the worst kind of brother. I mean, he won't sell it to his sister. He won't sell it to his mother, but he'll sell it to one a his boys on the street.
You sound like this shit'll change the world.

I don't know about all that change-the-world shit, but I do know they be going crazy over this. And the bitches... oh lord! Them bitches, they do anything for this, man! I had my jimmy waxed every day last week! You understand? Several times a day!

[laughs]
Get the fuck out of here! I know damn well ain't nobody sucked your shriveled-up dick.
You trying to dis me?
I'm just telling the truth. That's all I'm doing. Several times a day, my ass.

[after the carter is shut down]
A million dollar a week business reduce to fucking rubble!
Is this one of those black things?

[reading Pooky his rights]
Anything you say can and will be used against you in a muthafuckin' court of law!
Yo baby, we talkin' about combinating and consolidating, that's what's up!

[talking to Uniqua]
I knew I should've treated you like a hooker, you ain't nothing but a high-priced ho! Put Nino on the phone, bitch!

[talking to Duh Duh Man]
Unadulterated! Would you please shut the fuck up before you have a seizure!
I should have killed you myself, bitch!
Yeah, yeah, yeah a mind is a terrible thing to waste. Now back to the titties.
Operation's gone, Nino's loose, Pookie's dead. I got Pookie killed, man.
Cut out this self-pitying shit about you killing Pookie. If anyone killed him it was me. I could see it.
How the hell you gonna to tell me you killed Pookie?
Do you remember when you said I didn't care? When what the hell was I doing at Pookie's funeral anyway? Remember? I used to be Pookie.
How the hell you used to be Pookie?

I was poor white-trash Pookie. This whole drug shit, it's not a black thing, it's not a white thing. It's a death thing. Death don't give a shit about color. You don't have to like me. Hell, I don't even know if I like you. But we're in this together now, partner.

You know, a drug dealer is the worst kind of brother. He won't sell it to his sister, he won't sell it to his mother. But he'll sell it to one of his boys in the street. I don't know about you, but I'm ready to kill Nino Brown. Are you with me?
I'm ahead of you.
[Scotty and Nick clink beer bottles]
[as Frankie Needles departs from a nightclub, Nick and Scottie stick him up]
Behind Door Number One, your head explodes like a melon!
Behind door Number Two, you hook us up with Gee Money and get the prize, Nino Brown.
Am I my brother's keeper? Yes I am.
I had my jimmy waxed every day last week!
They got that shit hooked up like Mission Impossible, man!
Scottie, help me - I'm gonna die!
[peers into camera in despair]
[about a room used for freebasing]
They call it the Enterprise Room, man, because it's for people who wanna be beamed up to Scotty.

Yeah, we takin' over the Carter. We gon' bum rush the whole damn thing. Now if the tenants cooperate, oh, it'll be lovely. They'll be loyal customers, if not, fuck it, it'll be like in Beirut, they'll be live-in hostages.
I don't know about you, man. But I'm ready to kill Nino Brown.
Rock-a-bye, baby.
